title: Excision (2008) short film
description:
The award-winning short from 2008 later expanded into the 2012 full-length feature film.

A neglected teen takes refuge in the dreams that used to haunt her and orchestrates a shocking plan to prove her worth to her disapproving parents. 


Directed by
Richard Bates Jr.
